data.message: We all need “HOPE,” don’t we? During the stressful events in our lives as students, parents, and teachers, a little “HOPE” goes a long way! MTSU is  past due for an affiliated university organization that supports, encourages, and networks with fellow Blue Raiders to Help Others to Positive Expectations!  If you are an individual searching for such a network, please contact James at jab2bs@mtmail.mtsu.edu. We are in the preliminary stages and want to know what you as an individual needs, wants, and expects from such a organization on campus.Sometimes with the feelings of anxiety, depression, or the thoughts of suicide, we just need a listening ear… or to be able to connect with someone who has been in our shoes….sometimes we just need a little “HOPE.” Help us bring such hope to you and MTSU! Email us your information and we will update you as we turn this dream into a reality!We all need “HOPE,” don’t we? During the stressful events in our lives as students, parents, and teachers, a little “HOPE” goes a long way! MTSU is  past due for an affiliated university organization that supports, encourages, and networks with fellow Blue Raiders to Help Others to Positive Expectations!  If you are an individual searching for such a network, please contact James at jab2bs@mtmail.mtsu.edu. We are in the preliminary stages and want to know what you as an individual needs, wants, and expects from such a organization on campus.Sometimes with the feelings of anxiety, depression, or the thoughts of suicide, we just need a listening ear… or to be able to connect with someone who has been in our shoes….sometimes we just need a little “HOPE.” Help us bring such hope to you and MTSU! Email us your information and we will update you as we turn this dream into a reality!
